card.description: Survey of customers in a poke shop on whether or not they like certain poke combinations.

context.potentialUses: Help make recommendations for what kind of poke a new customer should buy.

avocado.description: Does the poke have avocado mixed in?

onion.description: Does the poke have onion mixed in?

masago.description: Does the poke have masago mixed in?

wasabi.description: Does the poke have wasabi mixed in?

ginger.description: Does the poke have ginger mixed in?

seaweed.description: Does the poke have seaweed mixed in?

furikake.description: Does the poke have furikake mixed in?

surimi.description: Does the poke have surimi mixed in?

chili.description: Does the poke have chili mixed in?

preference.description: Do you like or dislike the poke?
